compatibility.notes: Hippocratic-2.1 is a permissive license that allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL due to their requirements for derivative works.

key_requirements: Licensee accepts the License by taking any action with the Software that would infringe Licensor's rights.
Licensee must take practical steps to comply with the Notice section if notified of non-compliance.
license.name: Hippocratic-2.1
obligations: Licensee must ensure that everyone who receives a copy of the Software also receives the License and copyright notice.
Licensee must cause any modified versions of the Software to carry prominent notices stating that changes were made.
Licensee must comply with Human Rights Principles and Laws.
